verses.text: Now it came to pass, as \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* in his \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, that \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to \w Nathan|strong="H5416"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*, Lo, I \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in an \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w cedars|strong="H0730"\w*, but the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add remaineth\add* under \w curtains|strong="H3407"\w*.

Then \w Nathan|strong="H5416"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w Do|strong="H6213"\w* all that \add is\add* in thine \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*; for \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add is\add* with thee.
¶ And it came to pass the same \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, that the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* came to \w Nathan|strong="H5416"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Go|strong="H3212"\w* and \w tell|strong="H0559"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* my \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, Thou shalt not \w build|strong="H1129"\w* me an \w house|strong="H1004"\w* to dwell \w in|strong="H3427"\w*:

For I have not dwelt \w in|strong="H3427"\w* an \w house|strong="H1004"\w* since the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* that I brought \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*; but have gone from \w tent|strong="H0168"\w* to \w tent|strong="H0168"\w*, and from \add one\add* \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* \add to another\add*.\f + \fr 17.5 \ft have gone: Heb. have been\f*

Wheresoever I have \w walked|strong="H1980"\w* with all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* I a \w word|strong="H1697"\w* to \w any|strong="H0259"\w* of the \w judges|strong="H8199"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, whom I \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* to \w feed|strong="H7462"\w* my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Why have ye not \w built|strong="H1129"\w* me an \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w cedars|strong="H0730"\w*?

Now therefore thus shalt thou \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto my \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, I \w took|strong="H3947"\w* thee from the \w sheepcote|strong="H5116"\w*, \add even\add* from \w following|strong="H0310"\w* the \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*, that thou shouldest be \w ruler|strong="H5057"\w* over my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*:\f + \fr 17.7 \ft from following: Heb. from after\f*

And I have been with thee whithersoever thou hast \w walked|strong="H1980"\w*, and have cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* all thine \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* from \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee, and have \w made|strong="H6213"\w* thee a \w name|strong="H8034"\w* like the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the great \w men|strong="H1419"\w* that \add are\add* in the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

Also I will \w ordain|strong="H7760"\w* a \w place|strong="H4725"\w* for my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and will \w plant|strong="H5193"\w* them, and they shall \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* in their place, and shall be \w moved|strong="H7264"\w* no more; neither shall the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w wickedness|strong="H5766"\w* \w waste|strong="H1086"\w* them any \w more|strong="H3254"\w*, as at the \w beginning|strong="H7223"\w*,

And since the \w time|strong="H3117"\w* that I \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w judges|strong="H8199"\w* \add to be\add* over my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*. Moreover I will \w subdue|strong="H3665"\w* all thine \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*. Furthermore I \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* thee that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* will \w build|strong="H1129"\w* thee an \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

¶ And it shall come to pass, when thy \w days|strong="H3117"\w* be \w expired|strong="H4390"\w* that thou must \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \add to be\add* with thy \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, that I will raise \w up|strong="H6965"\w* thy \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* thee, which shall be of thy \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*; and I will \w establish|strong="H3559"\w* his \w kingdom|strong="H4438"\w*.
He shall \w build|strong="H1129"\w* me an \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and I will \w stablish|strong="H3559"\w* his \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.

I will be his \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, and he shall be my \w son|strong="H1121"\w*: and I will not \w take|strong="H5493"\w* my \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* \w away|strong="H5493"\w* from him, as I \w took|strong="H5493"\w* \add it\add* from \add him\add* that was \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee:

But I will \w settle|strong="H5975"\w* him in mine \w house|strong="H1004"\w* and in my \w kingdom|strong="H4438"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*: and his \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* shall be \w established|strong="H3559"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w evermore|strong="H5769"\w*.

According to all these \w words|strong="H1697"\w*, and according to all this \w vision|strong="H2377"\w*, so did \w Nathan|strong="H5416"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w David|strong="H1732"\w*.

¶ And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* and \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Who \add am\add* I, O 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and what \add is\add* mine \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, that thou hast \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* me \w hitherto|strong="H1988"\w*?

And \add yet\add* this was a small \w thing|strong="H6994"\w* in thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*; for thou hast \add also\add* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* of thy \w servant’s|strong="H5650"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* for a great while to \w come|strong="H7350"\w*, and hast \w regarded|strong="H7200"\w* me according to the \w estate|strong="H8448"\w* of a \w man|strong="H0120"\w* of high \w degree|strong="H4609"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

What \w can|strong="H3254"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \add speak\add* \w more|strong="H3254"\w* to thee for the \w honour|strong="H3519"\w* of thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*? for thou \w knowest|strong="H3045"\w* thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*.

O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, for thy \w servant’s|strong="H5650"\w* sake, and according to thine own \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, hast thou \w done|strong="H6213"\w* all this \w greatness|strong="H1420"\w*, in making \w known|strong="H3045"\w* all \add these\add* great \w things|strong="H1420"\w*.\f + \fr 17.19 \ft great…: Heb. greatnesses\f*

O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \add there is\add* none like thee, neither \add is there any\add* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w beside|strong="H2108"\w* thee, according to all that we have \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* with our \w ears|strong="H0241"\w*.

And what \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* in the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \add is\add* like thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, whom \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w went|strong="H1980"\w* to \w redeem|strong="H6299"\w* \add to be\add* his own \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, to \w make|strong="H7760"\w* thee a \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of \w greatness|strong="H1420"\w* and \w terribleness|strong="H3372"\w*, by driving \w out|strong="H1644"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* from \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, whom thou hast \w redeemed|strong="H6299"\w* out of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*?

For thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* didst thou \w make|strong="H5414"\w* thine own \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*; and thou, \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, becamest their \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

Therefore now, \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, let the \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* that thou hast \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* concerning thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* and concerning his \w house|strong="H1004"\w* be \w established|strong="H0539"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*, and \w do|strong="H6213"\w* as thou hast \w said|strong="H1696"\w*.

Let it even be \w established|strong="H0539"\w*, that thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w* may be \w magnified|strong="H1431"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \add is\add* the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \add even\add* a \w God|strong="H0430"\w* to \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: and \add let\add* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w* thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \add be\add* \w established|strong="H3559"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee.

For thou, O my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, hast \w told|strong="H1540"\w* thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* that thou wilt \w build|strong="H1129"\w* him an \w house|strong="H1004"\w*: therefore thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* hath \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \add in his heart\add* to \w pray|strong="H6419"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee.\f + \fr 17.25 \ft hast…: Heb. hast revealed the ear of thy servant\f*
And now, \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, thou art \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and hast \w promised|strong="H1696"\w* this \w goodness|strong="H2896"\w* unto thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*:

Now therefore let it \w please|strong="H2974"\w* thee to \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, that it may be \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*: for thou \w blessest|strong="H1288"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \add it shall be\add* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.\f + \fr 17.27 \ft let…: or, it hath pleased thee\f*
